Articles.Content:
Read from location 0000000000000000 caused an access violation.

This is happening repeatedly. Origionally posted in modded support, but have since done a clean install - fully removed except save - with the error still occuring.

Related files, from most recent crash at this time.  Used to play with not a single issue, but since recent update (unsure which as i havent played for a few months) this is on part adding while building, also happens at launch pad intermittently, and once on reentry.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/ry8u7zbdiu7axeq/crash.dmp?dl=0
https://www.dropbox.com/s/yylm8drq4qcwbgt/error.log?dl=0
https://www.dropbox.com/s/4tkq66rm00638k4/Player.log?dl=0

Hoping someone can assist? Admin feel free to merge my other post if needed.

Thank you in advance

Followup:
Have cleared all heatsinks, fans etc from system.  No heat issues as I did previously, but still crashing.  Loaded my game, went to vab, then clicked on switch mode - to hanger.  Thats all it took to get a CTD again.

Last entries shown in player log are...  

0x00007FFA7448BD9D (UnityPlayer) (function-name not available)
  ERROR: SymGetSymFromAddr64, GetLastError: 'Attempt to access invalid address.' (Address: 00007FFA7448BE78)
0x00007FFA7448BE78 (UnityPlayer) (function-name not available)
0x00007FFA747B2D68 (UnityPlayer) UnityMain
0x00007FFAEAE454E0 (KERNEL32) BaseThreadInitThunk
0x00007FFAECEE485B (ntdll) RtlUserThreadStart

Edited March 2, 2022 by Jasmine
new info added
